logo.template:
Enhance this design prompt by adding specific visual details. Keep it concise and focused only on the design elements. No code or formatting:
"${prompt}"
Enhanced version:
logo.description: Template for enhancing logo design prompts. Adds specific visual details, style elements, and color suggestions while maintaining brand identity.

examples.input: A coffee shop logo with beans
examples.output: A coffee shop logo featuring a stylized coffee bean with gradients and subtle shadows for depth, surrounded by abstract steam swirls in warm brown and beige tones.
An elegant willow tree logo with flowing branches and natural green tones, featuring delicate leaf details and a strong trunk base.

icon.template:
Enhance this design prompt by adding specific visual details. Keep it concise and focused only on the design elements. No code or formatting:
"${prompt}"
Enhanced version:
icon.description: Template for enhancing icon design prompts. Focuses on simplicity, recognizability, and essential visual elements.

examples.output: A simple mountain peak with a snow-capped summit and jagged rocks.
A minimalist chat bubble icon with smooth rounded corners and a subtle point at the bottom, perfect for small-scale display.
